entry.title: Country Chic - Vanilla Frosting
entry.summary:
Vendor: Country Chic
Type:
Price: 10.95 - 26.95 (2 variants)

Chalk Style All-in-One Paint is the best-rated furniture paint available today, and more and more DIYers are falling in love with it.

Certified 100% VOC-free, All-in-One Decor Paint contains clay and minerals to give you amazing adhesion and long-lasting durability with little-to-no prep work required. With superior coverage -- even with the bright colors -- it usually takes no more than one or two coats to complete your project.

Whether your goal is to make your piece look shabby chic or contemporary, you’ll love how silky soft and smooth this paint glides on. The wonderfully chalky matte finish is easy to distress, yet very durable.

Chalk Style All-in-One Furniture Paint Product Features:

  • Our Chalk Style All-in-One Paint has a Clay-base which means superior adhesion and coverage (requiring less paint coats)
  • Built-in primer and top coat which saves you time
  • Chalk matte finish
  • Very easy to distress for shabby chic finishes
  • Eco-friendly; contains NO harsh chemical additives such as phthalates, formaldehyde, heavy metals, or solvents
  • Certified safe for children’s toys and furniture*
  • Certified 100% VOC-free, including VOC-free pigments*
  • Suitable for interior and exterior projects
  • Made in Canada

You can enjoy your updated furniture with a simple, beautiful chalk finish, or you can easily add special effects with our glazes, waxes, metallic creams, and more.

entry.title: Wax Brush
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 29.95

Our fabulous, American-made Wax Brushes are a must-have as they will make it so much easier to apply the exact amount of wax you need to all the nooks and crannies of your piece! They're high quality with stiff, synthetic bristles and a well-formed handle that makes them very comfortable to grip.

You can store your Wax Brush in a Ziploc bag between uses, or if you’d like to rejuvenate your brush, simply use Country Chic Paint's Brush Soap and warm water to clean and condition the bristles.

Wax Brush Product Features:

  • Perfect for pushing wax into the nooks and crannies of your piece
  • Long-lasting, synthetic bristles
  • Made in the USA
  • 1.5" diameter
  • Contains no animal products

entry.title: Country Chic - Clear Bonding Primer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Country Chic
Type:
Price: 10.95 - 38.95 (3 variants)

When painting a very slick or smooth surface (e.g., laminate furniture, glass, metal) you may need some extra help with adhesion to ensure the paint will stick and stay put for years to come.

Our Clear Bonding Primer takes the stress out of painting those tricky surfaces. It is 100% VOC-free and contains no harmful solvents, making it safer than many other primers. And because this primer is clear, you can still see the natural wood color underneath which is perfect if you’re going for a whitewashed or distressed look!

Clear Bonding Primer Product Features:

  • Bonding agents allow the paint to adhere to any smooth surface
  • Very easy to apply -- just brush it on
  • Eco-friendly and water-based, so very safe to use
  • Dries completely clear
  • Certified 100% VOC-free; contains NO harsh chemical additives such as phthalates, formaldehyde, heavy metals, or solvents*

PLEASE NOTE: Does not block bleed-through from tannins or nicotine.

Check out this Country Chic tutorial for information on how to use Clear Bonding Primer!

entry.title: Country Chic - Oval Paint Brush
entry.summary:
Vendor: Country Chic
Type:
Price: 22.95 - 27.95 (2 variants)

If you’re looking for a paint brush that will make painting effortless, look no further -- our Oval Paint Brush has densely-packed, synthetic bristles that allow you to achieve excellent paint coverage with minimal brush strokes. This top-of-the-line paint tool is available in two convenient sizes and will soon be your go-to brush for all your painting projects!

We recommend using only synthetic bristle brushes with Country Chic Paint products. Natural bristles absorb water, causing the bristles to flare and become too soft to paint effectively. Natural bristle brushes are also usually made from animal hair fibers often collected using inhumane practices and therefore, are not cruelty-free. Our Oval Paint Brush do not contain any animal products.

Cleaning your Oval Paint Brush is easy with our eco-friendly, 100% natural Brush Soap.

Oval Paint Brush Product Features:

  • Long-lasting, synthetic bristles
  • Available in two convenient sizes: 1.5” and 2”
  • Makes painting quick and easy
  • Holds more paint than flat-edged brushes
  • Reduces the look of brush strokes in your finish
  • Contains no animal products

entry.title: Country Chic - Natural Wax
entry.summary:
Vendor: Country Chic
Type:
Price: 12.95 - 15.95 (2 variants)

Light Protection

Natural Wax is perfect for protecting your painted or raw wood furniture. It adds a beautiful polished finish to any project, and because it’s all-natural, it’s also excellent for protecting children’s cribs, toys, and other furnishings.

Our Natural Wax is just that - 100% natural. No fumes. No chemicals. No solvents. Country Chic Paint is committed to keeping our products as natural as possible for you and the environment. You can even smell the delicious scent of beeswax when you open the jar; as an added bonus, with Natural Wax your hands will be soft and silky smooth when you’re finished your project!

If you want to add light protection to your furniture while also adding some antique effects or sparkle, try one of our tinted waxes. Looking for a product that adds a little more protection? Try Clear Coat or our most durable sealant, use Tough Coat instead of wax.

Natural Wax Product Features:

  • Adds a buttery smooth, professional-looking finish to your furniture
  • Made from 100% natural beeswax, tree nut oil, and carnauba wax
  • Adds a light layer of protection to your furniture
  • 100% VOC-free; contains NO harsh chemical additives such as phthalates, formaldehyde, heavy metals, or solvents
  • A little goes a long way

IMPORTANT NOTE: Natural Wax contains tree nut oil and may not be suitable for use by people with severe nut allergies.

Check out this Country Chic tutorial for information on how to use Natural Wax.

entry.title: Country Chic - White Wax
entry.summary:
Vendor: Country Chic
Type:
Price: 13.95 - 19.95 (2 variants)

Light Protection

From soft and bright to wispy and weathered, White Wax is popular for its diversity. This wax can be used to show off those intricate little details, to soften up the tone of bold color, or simply to whitewash a piece in order to give it an aged, coastal look. We recommend White Wax in combination with the paint colors Cobblestone, Bliss, and Elegance, but be creative and try it on any of the Country Chic Paint colors!

Because Country Chic Paint is absolutely committed to keeping our products as natural as possible for you, your family, and the environment, White Wax is 100% VOC-free and contains no chemical additives. The only thing you’ll smell when you open a White Wax jar is the sweet, pleasing scent of beeswax.

White Wax Product Features:

  • Adds a subtle whitewashed look to your furniture and home decor
  • Made from 100% natural beeswax, tree nut oil, and carnauba wax
  • Adds a light layer of protection to your furniture
  • 100% VOC-free; contains NO harsh chemical additives such as phthalates, formaldehyde, heavy metals, or solvents
  • A little goes a long way

IMPORTANT NOTE: White Wax contains tree nut oil and may not be suitable for use by people with severe nut allergies.

Check out this Country Chic tutorial for information on how to use White Wax.

entry.title: Country Chic - Tough Coat
entry.summary:
Vendor: Country Chic
Type:
Price: 12.95 - 32.95 (2 variants)

Maximum Protection

Tough Coat is an incredibly strong, water-based sealant. This is a very popular choice for people that want to seal kitchen cabinets, outdoor furniture, and tabletops to make them water-resistant, scratch-resistant, and better able to stand up to heavy wear and tear! As our strongest sealant, it offers maximum protection that will preserve your furniture’s surfaces for years to come.

How does Tough Coat differ from Clear Coat?

Tough Coat offers the highest durability and requires only two coats for maximum protection, whereas Clear Coat will require up to four coats. Tough Coat is VOC-compliant and best suited for kitchen table tops, kitchen cabinets, and outdoor furniture. Clear Coat, on the other hand, is 100% VOC-free and requires less of a learning curve to use. If you are not experienced with applying clear finishes, we suggest Clear Coat because it is more user-friendly than Tough Coat.

If you’d like to use a 100% natural product with light protection, try using Wax or Hemp Oil.

Tough Coat Product Features:

  • Adds extremely durable protection for high-traffic projects such as kitchen cabinets
  • Adds a beautiful satin sheen
  • Water-based and non-yellowing
  • Suitable for exterior projects
  • Eco-friendly and VOC-compliant

IMPORTANT NOTE: It is very important to make sure that you let your last coat of paint dry for at least 24 hours before proceeding with Tough Coat, otherwise you may end up with a streaky finish. If your workspace is cold or humid, you’ll want to wait at least 72 hours so your paint coats have plenty of time to dry all the way through.

PLEASE NOTE: Do NOT apply Wax, Hemp Oil, or other oil-based products before applying Tough Coat.

Check out this Country Chic tutorial for more information on how to use Tough Coat.

entry.title: Country Chic - Bliss
entry.summary:
Vendor: Country Chic
Type:
Price: 8.76 - 21.56 (2 variants)

Chalk Style All-in-One Paint is the best-rated furniture paint available today, and more and more DIYers are falling in love with it. This chalk-style paint has more 5-star reviews than any other furniture paint line on the market!

Certified 100% VOC-free, All-in-One Decor Paint contains clay and minerals to give you amazing adhesion and long-lasting durability with little-to-no prep work required. With superior coverage -- even with the bright colors -- it usually takes no more than one or two coats to complete your project.

Whether your goal is to make your piece look shabby chic or contemporary, you’ll love how silky soft and smooth this paint glides on. The wonderfully chalky matte finish is easy to distress, yet very durable.

Chalk Style All-in-One Furniture Paint Product Features:

  • Our Chalk Style All-in-One Paint has a Clay-base which means superior adhesion and coverage (requiring less paint coats)
  • Built-in primer and top coat which saves you time
  • Chalk matte finish
  • Very easy to distress for shabby chic finishes
  • Eco-friendly; contains NO harsh chemical additives such as phthalates, formaldehyde, heavy metals, or solvents
  • Certified safe for children’s toys and furniture*
  • Certified 100% VOC-free, including VOC-free pigments*
  • Suitable for interior and exterior projects
  • Made in Canada

You can enjoy your updated furniture with a simple, beautiful chalk finish, or you can easily add special effects with our glazes, waxes, metallic creams, and more.
